about.title: About me
about.one: Having trained at Epitech (currently in my 5th year), I'm passionate about web technologies and have extensive skills in C, CPP, Javascript and VueJS.
about.two: My current experience enables me to:
three: - Build a web application for your needs
- Work with teams of frontend and backend developers
- Create scripts to automate your tasks
about.four: My various professional experience enables me to respond effectively to your needs and excel in my field.
about.five: I'm always on the lookout for new collaborations to bring my expertise to your projects.

erudia.title: Erudia
erudia.description: Final year project at Epitech, carried out by myself and 9 other students. Erudia is a platform enabling researchers to publish and review scientific articles. It can also be used to search for articles and check their reliability.

teams.title: my_teams
teams.description: This project is to make a server running on your local machine and a client that can connect to this server. The client can then login and send messages to other clients. It demonstrates the use of select, send, read, bind and listen functions.

items.title: Back-end developer
description: Implementation of a database backup system with Kubernetes managed containers.

items.title: Front-end developer
description: Part-time 2 days/week at Axxones System for 6 months.
Redesign of the Mutuelle Générale de Prévoyance website.

items.title: FullStack developer
description: Creation of elements in Vue.js with full-text search and indexing.

items.title: Master Epitech (En cours)
items.description: The Grande Ecole Program is Epitech Technology's historic curriculum. It takes place over 5 years and is designed to train IT experts. It offers a dense and evolving technical content, including a diversity of programming projects and covering numerous languages that will enable students to tackle all new technologies.

items.title: Faculty of engineering and computing
items.description: I spent my fourth year studying at Dublin City University in Ireland. This enabled me to expand my skills in web design, project management and learn new technologies.

items.title: Bac Sciences de l'ingénieur
items.description: I obtained my baccalaureate in Engineering Sciences with a major in Computer and Digital Sciences (ISN).
